channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CA

item.title: Report I-2024090068
item.description:
Report I-2024090068

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-03T09:21:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-26
  • City: Los Angeles
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: SINGAPORE AIRLINES LIMITED
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Agent, Andre Senior, was locating the shipment into the third level of the warehouse racks. When one box fell from the skid while being positioned into racks. Once box fell then it started emanating smoke as it was being burnt. Our Warehouse Manager, Julio Galvez actioned upon seeing this situation happening and box was segregated by our warehouse supervisor, Miguel Lopez, and taken outside of the warehouse for any other reaction from the DG.
